text:
Hi, 
If I may, please don't do that. Whenever you query the Win32_Product class, it
triggers a 'reconfigure' of all MSI based (already installed) products.
It can be quite long and introduce changes.
Here's somehow an ackknowledgement from Microsoft:
https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/troubleshoot/windows-server/admin-development/windows-installer-reconfigured-all-applications

It's an old known issue (I cannot remember when it started). 
The resolution part and more info in that link is quite good and precise,
definitely worth a look. 
Emin

metadata.topic: RE: Detecting whether PC has Acrobat or Reader
metadata.subject: Re: [patchmanagement] RE: Detecting whether PC has Acrobat or Reader
